item.title: RT by @0xstark: That worked well last week, so here are this week's EF Research publications + collabs üëá
item.dc:creator: @barnabemonnot
item.description: That worked well last week, so here are this week's EF Research publications + collabs üëá

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Totally disagree with this take. Issuing assets on the L2 aligns the asset with the social consensus of the L2.
For it to be Ethereum aligned, it should be minted and its supply governed on Ethereum Mainnet.
Only exception would be for a native rollup.
item.dc:creator: @liamihorne
item.description:
Totally disagree with this take. Issuing assets on the L2 aligns the asset with the social consensus of the L2.

For it to be Ethereum aligned, it should be minted and its supply governed on Ethereum Mainnet.

Only exception would be for a native rollup.

nitter.freedit.eu/haydenzadams/status/1890432415132217595#m

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: 1/Driving real world impact with Ethereum in LatAm, a guest thread by @0xcush
In a region marked by financial exclusion, corruption and poor governance, Ethereum is paving the way for a more prosperous future for the region.
item.dc:creator: @ethereum
item.description:
1/Driving real world impact with Ethereum in LatAm, a guest thread by @0xcush

In a region marked by financial exclusion, corruption and poor governance, Ethereum is paving the way for a more prosperous future for the region.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 27. @MorphoLabs is a decentralized lending protocol with ~$4B total value locked.
Morpho offers lending, borrowing, and permissionless market creation with custom parameters. And the core contracts are immutable, meaning Morpho is not exposed to governance risks.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
27. @MorphoLabs is a decentralized lending protocol with ~$4B total value locked.

Morpho offers lending, borrowing, and permissionless market creation with custom parameters. And the core contracts are immutable, meaning Morpho is not exposed to governance risks.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 26. @Glowfnd is a platform that funds deployment & operation of new solar farms around the world, producing onchain carbon credits.
Glow currently has 95 active solar farms, producing 1,110 MWh/month.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
26. @Glowfnd is a platform that funds deployment & operation of new solar farms around the world, producing onchain carbon credits.

Glow currently has 95 active solar farms, producing 1,110 MWh/month.

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: EF Treasury has deployed:
- 10,000 ETH into Spark - 10,000 ETH into Aave Prime - 20,800 ETH into Aave Core - 4,200 ETH into Compound
We're grateful for the entire Ethereum security community that has worked diligently to make Ethereum DeFi secure and usable!
item.dc:creator: @ethereumfndn
item.description:
EF Treasury has deployed:

- 10,000 ETH into Spark
- 10,000 ETH into Aave Prime
- 20,800 ETH into Aave Core
- 4,200 ETH into Compound

We're grateful for the entire Ethereum security community that has worked diligently to make Ethereum DeFi secure and usable!

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 25. @Paragraph_xyz is a publishing and newsletter platform.
Writers can earn via subscriptions, and all posts are NFTs, giving fans a new way to support writers. My fave feature is how every post displays threads discussing it found on @farcaster_xyz (open protocols are good!)
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
25. @Paragraph_xyz is a publishing and newsletter platform.

Writers can earn via subscriptions, and all posts are NFTs, giving fans a new way to support writers. My fave feature is how every post displays threads discussing it found on @farcaster_xyz (open protocols are good!)

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 24. @ParallelTCG is a free-to-play scifi trading card game built on Ethereum.
Players compete with onchain cards representing 5 factions, competing for millions in prizes.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
24. @ParallelTCG is a free-to-play scifi trading card game built on Ethereum.

Players compete with onchain cards representing 5 factions, competing for millions in prizes.

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Censorship resistance isn‚Äôt just a nice to have‚Äîit‚Äôs a big part of what keeps Ethereum open, neutral, and unstoppable.
Our latest post dives into how Ethereum fights back against censorship, why it matters, and the role clients like Lodestar play in keeping the network permissionless.
item.dc:creator: @lodestar_eth
item.description:
Censorship resistance isn‚Äôt just a nice to have‚Äîit‚Äôs a big part of what keeps Ethereum open, neutral, and unstoppable.

Our latest post dives into how Ethereum fights back against censorship, why it matters, and the role clients like Lodestar play in keeping the network permissionless.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 23. @zkemail is a suite of integrations that make it easy for developers & users to use zk superpowers with an email address.
For example: with @zkemail you can set up an ethereum account recovery process, where your guardians are simply email addresses.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
23. @zkemail is a suite of integrations that make it easy for developers & users to use zk superpowers with an email address.

For example: with @zkemail you can set up an ethereum account recovery process, where your guardians are simply email addresses.
